choices.A: The Chinese coast guard seized one of four food packages dropped by a plane for Filipino navy personnel at a territorial outpost in the South China Sea and dumped the food into the sea.
choices.B: Turkish Foreign Minister Hakan Fidan visited China to bolster support for Hamas and increase trade, without condemning the Uyghur genocide.
choices.C: The US Marines deployed MQ-9A Reaper drones to the Philippines for reconnaissance and surveillance in the South China Sea.
choices.D: Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. reaffirmed the Philippines' commitment to peace amid rising tensions in the South China Sea.

choices.A: Second Thomas Shoal in the South China Sea.
The Chinese coast guard suspected the packages contained construction materials.

Q10.question: What was the broader context of the event?
